mapper.select: SELECT addr_no, addr_name, name, tel, dest, zip_code, addr, addr_detail, memo, total_count FROM ( SELECT addr_no, addr_name, name, tel, dest, zip_code, addr, addr_detail, memo, ROWNUM rn , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM addr_book WHERE member_no = 1) total_count FROM addr_book WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pageNo} * 5 AND member_no = #{member_no} ) a WHERE rn > (#{pageNo} - 1) * 5

choose.when: SELECT products_no, products_name, img_path, system_name, products_size, price, total_count FROM ( SELECT p.products_no, products_name, img_path, system_name, products_size, price, ROWNUM rn , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM products WHERE products_name LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%') total_count FROM products p JOIN products_img i ON p.products_no = i.products_no WHERE origin_name != 'View.png' AND ROWNUM <= #{pageNo} * 8 AND products_name LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' ) a WHERE rn > (#{pageNo} - 1) * 8
choose.otherwise: SELECT products_no, products_name, img_path, system_name, products_size, price, total_count FROM ( SELECT p.products_no, products_name, img_path, system_name, products_size, price, ROWNUM rn , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM products) total_count FROM products p JOIN products_img i ON p.products_no = i.products_no WHERE origin_name != 'View.png' AND ROWNUM <= #{pageNo} * 8 ) a WHERE rn > (#{pageNo} - 1) * 8

mapper.select: SELECT f.fc_name FROM ( SELECT fc_name, POWER(#{longitude} - fc_lat, 2) + POWER(#{latitude} - fc_lng, 2) lat FROM franchise WHERE fc_type IN(2, #{fc_type}) ORDER BY lat ) f WHERE ROWNUM = 1 AND lat < 0.001
